section.p: Cross off the 10 Shards. The woman lays out some oxhide cards, painted with primitive-looking runes.
'Aha!' she cries, 'the Piper and the Snake.' She shoves her face close to yours and barks, 'Be prepared to be the Piper, if you travel there.'
'And that's all, is it?' you ask.
She grunts, and stares out the window.
